column4: hello , I use ubuntu 11.10 and my laptop battery socket is dead ,, tried many times to replace it and no way it works and i can't afford a new laptop soon .. so is there a way to make my laptop remember the last date it was on so when i trun it on it just loses couple of hours not 5 years ??
I need an open source app that sets my time as the last time it was open .. or the bash command and I make the script my self
how to manage time and date from terminal ?
